response.answer_text: Browse without internet connection or no internet connection. Firefox and chrome allow you to use any website without internet connection in any windows 8, windows 7, windows 8.1 or 10. Download your entire website and access it without internet. Sound exciting? Yes now you can surf the web when lost of internet connection. Firefox and chrome allow you to use offline mode, in which cache of your browser helps to access website without internet. You need to follow some simple steps or change your setting in your web browser to access the website after lost of internet. When you are visiting any website, system store some copy of data in the form of cache. That stored data can access by the help of internet, but when there is no internet connection it is not possible to access that previous data and browser shows a error message on screen, and you are not able browse. click here to find out how:How use website without internet connection

Internet -which is a group of computer or network devices that are interconnected with each other. Internet uses physical medium(wired or wireless) and communication language which is TCP/IP.Without this there no way to communicate with Internet.All Internet provider gives services to access the internet like 500GB/month. You can make internet like forming a Network. Group of Computer make LAN. Group of LAN's make WAN. Group of WAN’s make INTERNET. The Client Application is Used to access the Internet. The Client Application (Browser like Firefox,Chrome,Opera,Safari,UC Browser) can download information and store it on local storage helps in make you to navigate that information even after you lost the internet connection. Make you feel like data(internet) access without internet. Internet contains trillions of information/data that stored on device that connected to internet. You can't make available that service unless with internet connection.
